text: I’ve been seeing Physician Zhang at 111 Somerset since last year to see balance my body constitution. I really appreciate how patient and caring she is. She takes the time to understand all my concerns and her prescription has helped to improve my condition. I always feel very relaxed after acupuncture. The staffs at the clinic are all very nice and the clinic is clean, modern, quiet and comfortable.
Dr Chang Shi Wen is very gentle and explain very clearly of the treatment I need to take for my waist/ back problem. Sharon and Ming Yuan are very helpful and friendly. Will recommend this place.

Physician Zhang is very patient and detailed during the consultation. She explained the condition and gave recommendations on what to avoid or to do to help improve my situation. I’ve seen her for quite some time and has seen significant improvements.
Dr Zhang is a fantastic doctor. She is very gentle and caring! The diagnosis was very accurate. After a few weeks of treatment, my medical conditions improved tremendously. Highly recommended!

Happy and thankful to found a good physician, Dr. Zhang at TripleOne Kang Shou. She is extremely patience and experienced. My nasty phlegm that has been with me for awhile has been finally cured and now going through a process to fine tune my body to strengthen health. Worth to recommend friends and relatives whoever needed a better healthy body.
